members.name: isDerp
members.comment: Gets whether this snowman is in "derp mode", meaning it is not wearing a pumpkin.

return: True if the snowman is bald, false if it is wearing a pumpkin

members.name: setDerp
members.comment: Sets whether this snowman is in "derp mode", meaning it is not wearing a pumpkin. NOTE: This value is not persisted to disk and will therefore reset when the chunk is reloaded.

param: derpMode - True to remove the pumpkin, false to add a pumpkin
